title: Anyone having problem logging in?
body:
Per topic.

Also, game kept saying "unable to create lobby, please close client and try again."

anyone else ran into this problem before?

replies.body: I wasn't able to see any issues here with service overnight, so that's pretty interesting.  Is this issue still happening?
Trying to connect since 2 hours in eune and euw and I can't, and when I logged in I can't start a game as what happened with you

I have the same issue. I'm also perma-disconnected from chat. Happens since yesterday.

Edit: I also re-installed the game. Still the same.
